about_the_game:
"Hey! Put your clothes back on and get to work!"

Solace Inc. Naughty DLC is an optional DLC that enables adult content within the game. This adds in new dialogue, new appearances for certain characters, and some extra sex animations. This is purely a cosmetic addition and adds very little to the overall experience.

Disclaimer: This DLC may contain content that not everyone may be comfortable with, such as:
  • Sex with non-humans (that pass the harkness test)
  • LGBTQ+ themes

Also, all cameo characters are disabled when 18+ content is enabled. This content can be toggled within the settings menu.

Enjoy!

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC features explicit adult content, which includes nudity, genitalia, and sexual intercourse

name: Solace Inc - Naughty DLC (18+)
